title: [Compose] java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: needs >= 2 number of colors
body:
**Checklist**

1. Crash recorded blow.
2. Lottie link shared

**Describe the bug**
A lottie animetion is making the app crash.

**What version of Lottie did you test this on?**
4.0.0 and 4.2.2

**What version of Android did you test this on?**
11 and 12

**Steps To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. This is the lottie file you can you use: https://edit.lottiefiles.com/?src=https%3A%2F%2Fassets3.lottiefiles.com%2Fpackages%2Flf20_1llndcfr.json
2. Use the Lottie app in google play store, and preview the animation
4. See the issue which makes the app crash.

Here is the crash:
